text: Hi, not quite sure what you mean. Can you be more specific? Overall I think your career path is good. Whether you follow a degree first or an apprenticeship is up to you and your circumstances. The apprenticeship looks attractive however, I would explore the possibility of doing an engineering degree at some point as it will enable better job prospects and the ability to move on from BA.

It has been good being touch with you however, I don't feel I have provided you with the value from this programme that you need. I think having a discussion early on would have been beneficial to us both and enabled more in-depth conversations around your career aspirations. This is something I will ensure is done next time I do this. Would you have found a regular call beneficial?
